description:
Massive corporation L-Corp doesn`t just create smartphone OSes and home electronics, they also sponsor Appliyama 470... and they`ve created a city run by artificial intelligence, which the whole gang gets to go see!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Thank You Mirai! Jinkouchinou no Machi e Youkoso!
Thank You, Future! Welcome to the AI City!
サンキュー未来! 人工知能の街へようこそ!
